general.name: God Mode [ACS]
general.description:
This component will grant temporary local administrative access to the currently logged in CONSOLE user. On Windows 10 and above, it will additionally create the God Mode folder on the Desktop. Max time is 480 minutes which is 8hours. Permissions and folder are removed via hidden scheduled task, and if the machine is offline, it will run on next boot. All group additions and removals are logged in C:\Temp\datto_god_mode.log
USE WITH CAUTION

variable.name: GodModeTime
variable.description: Time you want to allow GodMode in MINUTES. Valid range 1-480.
